Package nz.ac.auckland.morc.resource

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TestResource<T>
    An interface for providing test resources for expectations or requests/inputs
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentTypeTestResource
    A class to set the Content-Type header in a response, or validate it was returned correctly
    ExceptionTestResource
    A resource for testing that an exception is of the same type (or subclass)
    GroovyTemplateTestResource
    A test resource that has delayed evaluation of a groovy script with appropriate variables
    HeadersTestResource
    Provides a mechanism for setting key/value pairs for message headers either as a mock response, or setting an expectation for the contents of a header.
    HttpMethodTestResource
    A resource for returning or validating particular HTTP methods
    HttpPathTestResource
    A resource for returning non-200 HTTP codes back to the client, or testing that such an response was received
    HttpStatusCodeTestResource
    A resource for returning non-200 HTTP codes back to the client, or testing that such an response was received
    JsonTestResource
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving JSON values from a file/URL/String and also validating the response from a target service.
    PlainTextTestResource
    A simple mechanism for sending and comparing plain text values using the Java equals mechanism
    SoapFaultTestResource
    A way to specify a SOAP Fault to return back to the application under testing, or validate a response SoapFault
    StaticTestResource<T>
    Used for retrieving static resources necessary for either sending values to an artifact under testing, or validating an expectation
    XmlTestResource
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving XML values from a file/URL/String and also validating a response from a target service.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HttpMethodTestResource.HttpMethod
